# NETWORK::NETWORK_FADE_OUT_ENTITY

## Summary
Fades out the entity locally and remotely

## Parameters
* **ENTITY_INDEX** entity
* **BOOL** flash: If true, the entity will flash during the fade, if false the entity will do a smooth fade
* **BOOL** network: If true, the fade will be networked and appear on other machines

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
normal - transition like when your coming out of LSC
slow - transition like when you walk into a mission
